projects.name: Versaile
projects.description: Developed an innovative, AI-driven online text editor that facilitated real-time collaboration and document sharing, driving a 30% reduction in project completion time and enhancing team efficiency. Enabled document enrichment through AI insights, facilitated collaboration through shareable links, and added a docx download feature upon completion.

projects.name: RestEZ
projects.description: Built web app using Gemini API to automate REST API backend code generation saving devs 66% of their time per project (eliminating boilerplate code). Empowers devs to focus on core logic by auto-generating backend structures improving development speed and project efficiency.

projects.name: FolkFindz
projects.description: Led the 'FolkFindz' initiative, dedicated to preserving cultural traditions, resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement and a significant 25% boost in site traffic. Applied web development skills to create a fully functional website, overseeing every project lifecycle aspect, resulting in a seamless user experience and a 20% reduction in bounce rates.

experiences.description: Designed and developed web applications using the MERN stack and React Native, enhancing client satisfaction and reducing development time by 30% through agile methodologies. Conducted meticulous project planning and implemented unit and end-to-end tests, achieving a 95% code coverage and integrating CMS and serverless deployments.

Mentored students in web dev projects using MERN stack, resolving 50+ doubts (average rating 4.34, optimized 4.5) and empowering skill development. Thrived as a teaching assistant, exceeding expectations (3960 points) by resolving student doubts (implementation, coding, concepts) and fostering a collaborative learning environment.

Pioneered to the development of a comprehensive website listing web3 projects across 100+ blockchains, facilitating user discovery through coin chain sorting and search functionality. Collaborated in open-sourcing a Next.js-based project, promoting transparency and community engagement in web3 development while showcasing proficiency in modern frameworks.

Crafted 'FolkFindz,' a digital hub fostering connections between artisans and enthusiasts, leading to a 30% increase in sales and substantial revenue growth for local businesses. Cultivated a deeper understanding of industry-leading practices, refining coding techniques, and contributed to the successful completion of 3+ projects within specified timelines.

soft_skills: Strong foundation in Data Structures & Algorithms
full_output.name: Sparsh Shandilya
achievements_and_awards: Showcased exceptional teamwork skills at HackWithMait 4.0's Tezos Sponsor Track, collaborating effectively to secure a top 3 finish amongst 230+ participating teams.
Attained a position within the top 15% nationwide out of 48k+ teams in the esteemed HackOn With Amazon-Season 3 competition.
Secured 29th position in ZS Campus Beats Tech Challenge 2024 out of 800+ teams.
